scripts.text:
ALTER procedure addnewcolll(@newcolllTile varchar(25),@newcolllAuthor varchar(30),@newcolllGenre varchar(30),@newcolllID INT OUTPUT)
As 
INSERT INTO colll(ColllTitle,Author,Genre)
Values
(@newcolllTile,@newcolllAuthor,@newcolllGenre)

SET @newcolllID = SCOPE_IDENTITY()

SET @newcolllID = scope_identity
